title: Game-Based Computer Writing Strategy Training: Application of the ARCS Model

context.additional_context: Language education curriculum for novice learners in professional fields (medical/legal/technical) in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply three essay introduction writing strategies with 80% accuracy through game-based activities
Learners can independently draft introductions for complex topics in at least two out of three attempts through project-based assignments

Learners can evaluate the impact of game elements (quizzes, reward systems) on learning motivation (based on ARCS model: Attention/Relevance/Confidence/Satisfaction) at 3.0 or higher on a 4-point scale in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
